scripts.build: npm install -g postcss postcss-cli autoprefixer && cd exampleSite && hugo --gc --minify -t ../.. -d ../docs -v -b https://hugo-introduction.netlify.app/
scripts.postinstall: node -e 'const fs = require("fs"); fs.existsSync("./node_modules/fsevents") && fs.rmdirSync("./node_modules/fsevents", { recursive: true, force: true });'
